project_info.description: Continue implementing the claude-code-idp-wrapper project following the implementation plan. Please:  1. Read the CLAUDE.md file for current project context and architecture decisions  2. Review the implementation plan at /home/ichardart/claude-code-idp-implementation-plan.md to  identify Day 3-4 tasks  3. Implement Sonnet Task 5 (Authentication Layer) and Sonnet Task 6 (Configuration Management) from  the plan  4. Focus on:     - Auth proxy implementation with API key management     - Key rotation and multi-provider support (Anthropic, Bedrock, Vertex)     - Rate limiting per tenant     - Configuration system with hot reloading     - Per-tenant settings management  Follow the established patterns in the codebase for error handling, logging, and TypeScript strict  mode. Write comprehensive tests for all new components. The foundation CLI wrapper service is  complete - build upon it.

recommendation.description: Extend IDP capabilities with new MCP servers for specific integrations
